author: Posted At Pm On February
title: ‘What a clown!’: Tucker Carlson slams mandate that Russian hacking story be taught in schools – twitchy.com
text:
‘What a clown!’: Tucker Carlson slams mandate that Russian hacking story be taught in schools Posted at 11:08 pm on February 6, 2017 by William A. 
On Monday’s show, Tucker Carlson had California Assemblyman Marc Levine on to discuss school textbooks teaching about the alleged manipulation of the 2016 presidential election by Russian hackers. 
Here’s video of the segment: #Tucker to @MarcLevine_CA : Why should politicians be involved in crafting textbooks? – TCT @FoxNews 
— Tucker Carlson (@TuckerCarlson) February 7, 2017 . @MarcLevine_CA : We have a president @realDonaldTrump who is the least curious man on the planet on the issue of Russian hacking. -TCT 
— Tucker Carlson (@TuckerCarlson) February 7, 2017 . @MarcLevine : "We need to understand our history to have a sense of what foreign policy we have in the future." #Tucker pic.twitter.com/1z6gfPVgRn 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 7, 2017 . @MarcLevine : “We have a president who is the least curious man on the planet about [Russian hacking of US election]." #Tucker pic.twitter.com/IH5Lkwn6Kx 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 7, 2017 Trending
